message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $150. Would it be possible to negotiate further?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $175. It's a great compromise, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget, I am only able to consider offers at or below $150. Could we possibly reach an agreement within this range?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $155. It's the lowest I can go, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
